tswitem.name: Signet of Nergal's Ire
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Nergal's Ire
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you are hit, you have a 5%/10%/15% chance to apply one stack of Corrupt, Debilitated, or Exposed to your attacker. If the attack was blocked, evaded, or if it glanced you, there is an additional 5%/10%/15% chance to apply one stack of Corrupt, Debilitated, or Exposed to your attacker. This Signet can be attached to Major Talismans. "
